issue.title: [CF 327] Raid size group conditions
issue.body:
My grid and auras move around based on group size so I have different icon groups for 10 and 25 man raids. Right now I use "GetCurrentRaidDifficulty() ==1 or GetCurrentRaidDifficulty() == 3" for 10s and "GetCurrentRaidDifficulty() == 2 or GetCurrentRaidDifficulty() == 4" for 25s in group conditions as a simple check to show the right one. I just thought it might be helpful for some people if a set of group/raid/instanceType conditions were available or addition enable options were shown on the group's main tab for instance type/size.

Just throwing it out there in case it would be useful for someone else :p


> Posted by CurseForge user nebula169 | Imported from CurseForge issue #327 | Raw

comments.body:
These conditions do exist. See "Instance Type" under the (poorly named) "Attributes" category.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

ah, thanks, I had thought I looked through all of the options, but must have missed that :p


> Posted by CurseForge user nebula169
